summary: Cloudflare Worker serving as the authentication gateway and reverse proxy.
context_hints: Check here for JWT verification logic
Handles routing of authenticated requests to upstream services
Manages CORS and security headers at the edge

subdirectories.src: Source code for the worker logic.

key_files.src/index.ts: Main worker entry point handling request interception.
key_files.wrangler.toml: Cloudflare Workers configuration including bindings and routes.

architecture_notes: Edge-deployed middleware. Verifies tokens before they reach the Python backend.
